entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers or a few thunderstorms beginning early this morning. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon then west 30 gusting to 60. High 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
